template.name: Huawei CCU Template
template.description: The liquid-cooled cabinet CCU supports the Zabbix template.

item.name: moduleName
item.description: Identify the module type (CCU or CDU).

item.name: systemHardwareVersion
item.description: Querying the Software Version of the System Hardware

trigger.name: Door Status 1 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Door Status 2 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Float Liquid Level 1 Overrun
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0 - Normal, 1 - Overrun)

trigger.name: Float Liquid Level 2 Overrun
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0 - Normal, 1 - Overrun)

trigger.name: Float Liquid Level 3 Overrun
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0 - Normal, 1 - Overrun)

trigger.name: Float Liquid Level 4 Overrun
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0 - Normal, 1 - Overrun)

trigger.name: Leakage Watering
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Watering)

trigger.name: Photoelectric Liquid Level 1 Overrun
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0 - Overrun, 1 - Normal)

trigger.name: Photoelectric Liquid Level 2 Overrun
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0 - Overrun, 1 - Normal)

trigger.name: Photoelectric Liquid Level 3 Overrun
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0 - Overrun, 1 - Normal)

trigger.name: Photoelectric Liquid Level 4 Overrun
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0 - Overrun, 1 - Normal)

trigger.name: Solenoid Valve Electric Actuator 1 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Solenoid Valve Electric Actuator 2 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Temperature Humidity 1 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Temperature Humidity 2 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Temperature Humidity 3 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Temperature Humidity 4 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Temperature Humidity 5 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Temperature Humidity 6 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)

trigger.name: Temperature Humidity 7 Abnormal
trigger.description: This value will be one of the following: (0-Normal, 1-Abnormal)
